content: As he struggles to rise, unleash a heavy attack using your Pillar Stance on his head and he'll likely topple back to the ground giving you a bit more time to defeat him.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Longevity Road'.
The content is as follows:
As he struggles to rise, unleash a heavy attack using your Pillar Stance on his head and he'll likely topple back to the ground giving you a bit more time to defeat him.
